auth.mfa_required: E hiahiatia ana te whakaūnga MFA
auth.mfa_verification_required: E hiahiatia ana te whakaūnga MFA hei uru ki tō pūkete

security.authentication_failed: I rahua te whakaūnga. Tēnā manatoko i ō taipitopito whakaūnga ka ngana anō.
security.rate_limited: He maha rawa ngā ngana. Tēnā ngana anō i muri mai.
security.session_expired: Kua pau te wātū. Tēnā takiuru anō.
security.recovery_code_not_found: Kāore i kitea te waehere whakaora. Tēnā manatoko i tō tāurunga.
security.recovery_code_used: Kua whakamahia kē tēnei waehere whakaora. Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere.
security.network_error: Hapa whatunga. Tēnā tirotiro i tō hononga ka ngana anō.
security.internal_error: I puta tētahi hapa. Tēnā ngana anō.

magicLink.title: Takiuru mā te Īmēra
magicLink.description: Ka tukuna e mātou he hononga takiuru haumaru ki a koe
magicLink.sentTo: I tuku mātou i tētahi hononga takiuru ki {email}
magicLink.linkExpiresIn: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i te 15 meneti
magicLink.noPasswordNeeded: Kāore e hiahiatia he kupuhipa — pāwhiritia noa te hononga i tō īmēra
magicLink.requestFailed: I rahua te tuku hononga takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.
magicLink.loginFailed: I rahua te takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.
magicLink.signingYouIn: Kei te takiuru i a koe...
magicLink.pleaseWait: Tēnā taihoa i a mātou e whakaū ana i tō hononga

webauthn.signIn: Takiuru mā te Face ID / Touch ID
webauthn.notSupported: Kāore te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora e tautokohia i tēnei pūtirotiro
webauthn.requiresModernBrowser: Tēnā whakamahia tētahi pūtirotiro hou-ake e tautoko ana i WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge rānei)
webauthn.setupSuccess: Kua whakahohea te takiuru pūāhua koiora
webauthn.setupFailed: I rahua te whakatū takiuru pūāhua koiora
webauthn.authFailed: I rahua te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora. Tēnā ngana anō.
webauthn.description: Whakamahia tō maihi-matikara, kanohi, kī haumaru rānei hei takiuru
webauthn.supportedMethods: E tautoko ana i Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, me ngā kī haumaru

lockout.attempts_remaining: Whakatūpato: {count} ngā ngana takiuru e toe ana
lockout.account_locked: Kua raka te pūkete nā te maha o ngā ngana takiuru i rahua
lockout.locked_until: Kua raka tō pūkete tae noa ki {time}
lockout.contact_support: Whakapā ki te tautoko mēnā e hiahiatia ana te urunga tere
lockout.try_password_reset: Ka taea e koe te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa

sessions.title: Ngā Wātū Hohe
sessions.remove_all: Takiputa i Ngā Wātū Kē Atu Katoa
sessions.confirm_remove: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i tēnei wātū?
sessions.confirm_remove_all: Ka takiputa tēnei i a koe mai i ngā pūrere kē atu katoa. E tino hiahia ana koe?
sessions.removed_all_success: Kua takiputa ngā wātū kē atu katoa

mfa.title: Whakaūnga Pūāhua-Rua
mfa.setup_description: Tāpiri i tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri ki tō pūkete
mfa.scan_qr: Kamera i tēnei waehere QR ki tō taupānga whakaū
mfa.manual_entry: Tāuru rānei i tēnei waehere ā-ringa
mfa.verify_code: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga
mfa.code_required: E hiahiatia ana te waehere whakaū
mfa.invalid_code: Waehere muhu. Ka pau ngā waehere ia 30 hēkona. Whakamātau i te waehere hou rawa atu mai i tō taupānga whakaū.
mfa.require_password: Tāuru tō kupuhipa hei monoki i te 2FA
mfa.password_reason: Whakaū i tō tuakiri hei whakarerekē i ngā tautuhinga whakaūnga pūāhua-rua
mfa.cancel: Whakakore me te hoki ki te takiuru
mfa.loading_status: Kei te uta i te tūnga MFA...
mfa.protected_description: Kua tiakina tō pūkete ki te whakaūnga pūāhua-rua
mfa.enable_description: Tiaki i tō pūkete ki tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri
mfa.benefit_unauthorized: Ārai i te urunga kore mana ahakoa he hē tō kupuhipa
mfa.benefit_apps: Ka mahi tahi me Google Authenticator, Authy, me ētahi atu taupānga TOTP
mfa.benefit_recovery: Ngā waehere whakaora taraki mō te urunga ohotata
mfa.supported_apps: Whakamahi i Google Authenticator, Authy, tētahi taupānga TOTP rānei
mfa.enter_code_description: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga whakaū
mfa.enter_recovery_code: Tāuru tētahi o ō waehere whakaora
mfa.recovery_code_mode_active: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaora
mfa.otp_mode_active: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaū
mfa.enter_all_digits: Tēnā tāuru i ngā mati 6 katoa kia haere tonu

recovery_codes.title: Ngā Waehere Whakaora
recovery_codes.description: Tiaki i ēnei waehere ki tētahi wāhi haumaru. Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere mēnā ka ngaro tō urunga ki tō taupānga whakaū.
recovery_codes.warning: Ka whakaatuhia ēnei waehere kotahi anake
recovery_codes.save_required: Me tikiake, tārua rānei i ō waehere whakaora i mua i te whakaoti whakatūnga.
recovery_codes.generate_new_warning: Ka whakakorehia e tēnei ngā waehere whakaora tīari katoa
recovery_codes.copied: Kua tāruatia ngā waehere ki te papatopenga
recovery_codes.copy_failed: I rahua te tārua i ngā waehere ki te papatopenga
recovery_codes.remaining: {count} ngā waehere whakaora e toe ana
recovery_codes.usage_hint: Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere. Hangaia anō ngā waehere mēnā kei te iti haere.
recovery_codes.none_remaining: Kāore he waehere whakaora e toe ana
recovery_codes.generate_success: Kua hangaia ngā waehere whakaora hou
